title: How does the ip redward work?
body:
So i had a game in twisted treeline as yasuo and i sucked, i got 5/11/5 but we won anyways and the game was untill the 21min mark and i somehow recived 220ip something.
And then i started another game as jax, i got  23/5/5 and the game length was 23min and i got 71 ip
Can anyone explain how this works and im lvl 30 
Yes i suck at english.

replies.body:
The [wiki article](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Influence_Points) is a bit outdated, but gives a decent explanation.

Basically, IP gains depend on a few factors. 

* The map/mode (e.g. TT, SR, ARAM) determines the base amount of IP.
* The match length (i.e. how long the game lasted) adds IP, with longer matches giving more IP.
* Winning grants more IP than losing.
* There's some extra IP bonuses too (e.g. "Matchmade game bonus" and such).

IP boosts grant additional IP. Playing Co-op vs AI grants less IP. KDA has no impact on IP gain.

Minarde provided some accurate info here. If you'd like a complete list of factors that go into earning IP, our [IP/XP Rewards Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown) goes over them in-depth.

Let me know if you have any questions.
